title: War of the Roses: She's in His Phone as BC
description: Joy was helping her boyfriend Gus find his phone the other day and noticed her name in his phone came up as BC which are NOT her initials.  So now she's wondering what that means.  Is he trying to hide her identity because he's cheating or does he have a nickname for her?
